info.title: SAR-CWS

get.description: Returns the lists of values for the filters of permits Search page.
Returns the lists of values for the filters of Species Search page.
Returns a list of the first 2000 Species with default ordering and filter counts for all options. Used when the search page is loaded for the first time. Can be cached.

post.description: Returns a list of Species search results in pages based on the current filter states and user-entered keywords.

get.description: Returns the list of all available Permits.

post.description: Returns the lists of the results for Permits Search page.

get.description: Returns the list of values for the filters of Public Consultations.
Returns the list of all public consultations.

post.description: Returns the list of the results for Public Consultations search page.

get.description: Returns the list of all documents.
Returns the list of all Schedule 1 species.
Returns the list of all Migratory Birds species.
Returns the profile of the selection species.

PermitsFiltersResponse.description: The collection of Permits Search Filter groups used to filter search results.

filters.description: A collection of Permit filter groups.

order.description: A list of filter group names specifying the UI rendering order.

PermitsFiltersResponse.example:
{
    "returnStatus": "ok",
    "order": ["issuingAuthorities", "issuingYears", "issuingMonths"],
    "filters": {
        "issuingAuthorities": [
            { 
                "id": 2, 
                "name": "Environment Canada", 
                "itemCount": null

cosewicRangeIds.description: A comma-separated list of range Ids.

cosewicAssessmentDate.description: COSEWIC assessment date, pre-formate on the server.

legalDateListing.description: Legal / SARA listing date, pre-formatted on the server.

users.description: A list of recovery team users.

image.description: A list of species image file name.

PermitDetailsResponse.title: Root Type for PermitDetails
PermitDetailsResponse.description: The root of the PermitDetails type's schema.

relatedSpecies.description: List of species related to the permit

purposes.description: List of purposes related to permit

CommonFilterOption.description: An option in a Species Search Filter group.

itemCount.description: The number of search results valid under this filter option.

filters.description: A list of filter counters based on the current search.

recordCount.description: 'The total number of records returned by the search.

PermitsSearchGetResponse.description:
Returns the default first batch of permit results assuming all the default filter settings.
Returns filter counts for all filter options.

filters.description: A list of filter counters based on the current search.

recordCount.description: 'The total number of records returned by the search. '

PermitsSearchGetResponse.example:
{
    "returnStatus": "ok",
    "recordCount": 214,
    "records": [
        {
            "permitId": 309,
            "permitTitle": "Explanation for issuing ...",
            "typeId": 3,
            "issuingAuthorityId": 2,
            "issuingAuthority": "Environment Canada",
            "issueDate": "2011-Jan-19",
            "expiryDate": "2014-01-18",
            "issueYear": 2011,
            "issueMonth": 1,
            "permitStatus": 50
        }
    ],
    "filters": {
        "issuingAuthorities": [
            { 
                "id": 2, 
                "name": "Environment Canada", 
                "itemCount": 19 
            },
            {

            { "id": 2011, "name": "2011", "itemCount": 93 },
            { "id": 2012, "name": "2012", "itemCount": 24 },
            { "id": 2013, "name": "2013", "itemCount": 61 },
            { "id": 2014, "name": "2014", "itemCount": 47 },
            { "id": 2015, "name": "2015", "itemCount": 45 },
            { "id": 2016, "name": "2016", "itemCount": 94 },
            { "id": 2017, "name": "2017", "itemCount": 37 },

            { "id": 7, "name": "7", "itemCount": 54 },

        ]
    }
}

issuingYears.description: A list of issuing year ids as strings.

issuingMonths.description: A list of issuing month ids as strings.

orderField.description: A first field to order the results by.

orderDirection.description: A sort direction. "A" - ascending; "D" - descending. Defaults to "A".

pageNumber.description: The server paging number. Default to 1.

pageSize.description: The number of records in server paging. Defaults to 2000.

issuingAuthorities.description: A list of issuing athority ids as strings.

searchAll.description: A flag indicating if all the keywords should be present in each of the search results.

rangeId.description: A list of range Ids as strings.

taxonomyId.description: A list of taxonomy Ids as strings.

cosewicStatusId.description: A list of COSEWIC status Ids as strings.

saraStatusId.description: A list of SARA status Ids as strings.

scheduleId.description: A list of SARA schedule Ids as strings.

considerationId.description: A list of under-consideration Ids as strings.

pagingSize.description: The number of records in server paging. Defaults to 2000.

orderBy.description: A field name to order the results by. The second order criterion is is by species name.

orderDirection.description: A sort direction. "A" - ascending; "D" - descending. Defaults to "A".

pageNo.description: The server paging number. Default to 1.

SpeciesFiltersResponse.description: The collection of Species Search Filter groups used to filter search results.

order.description: A list of filter group names specifying the UI rendering order.

filters.description: A collection of Species filter groups.

PermitsFilters.description: A collection of Permit filter groups.

issuingYears.description: "Issuing years" filter group. Year id matches year value for simplicity.

issuingMonths.description:
"Issuing months" filter group.
Months' ids should be from 0 to 11.

SpeciesFilters.description: The collection of Species Search Filter groups used to filter search results.

recordCount.description: The total number of Schedule 1 species records returned by the search.

legalNameCommaEn.description: Legal name with the taxonomy terms reverse and separated by a comma ("Bear, Grizzly" as opposed to "Grizzly Bear"). English only.

taxonomySortId.description: Taxonomy sort id. Used to sort taxonomic groups; not related to taxonomy ids.

recordCount.description: The total number of records returned by the search.

imageFieldPath.description: The path to the species image folder.

filters.description: A list of filter counters based on the current search.

ConsultationsFiltersResponse.description: The collection of Public Consultation Search Filter groups used to filter search results.

filters.description: A collection of Public Consultation filter groups.

order.description: A list of filter group names specifying the UI rendering order.

legalCommonName.description: Legal common name in the current language.

cosewicScientificName.description: COSEWIC scientific name in the current language. Might contain HTML markup which needs to be stripped.

legalScientificName.description: Legal scientific name in the current language.

legalPopulation.description: Legal population name in the current language.

recordCount.description: The total number of Migratory Birds records returned by the search.

ConsultationsFilters.description: A collection of Public Consultation filter groups.

consultationYear.description: Filter group of Public Consultation years, where id is year.

ConsultationsSearchGetResponse.description: Returns the default public consultation results with default filter settings.

recordCount.description: The total number of records returned by the search.

records.description: A list of public consultation records.

ConsultationsSearchGetResponse.example:
{
    "recordCount": 774,
    "returnStatus": "OK",
    "records": [
        {
            "attachments": [
                {
                    "attachmentId": 157,
                    "attachmentLanguage": "E",
                    "attachmentPublicationDate": "2003-05-03T00:00:00",
                    "attachmentTitle": "Order Extending The Time for the Assessment of the Status of Wildlife Species, Vol. 137, No. 18",
                    "html": null,
                    "pdf": "g1-13718_o1_e.pdf"
                },
                {
                    "attachmentId": 158,
                    "attachmentLanguage": "F",
                    "attachmentPublicationDate": "2003-05-03T00:00:00",
                    "attachmentTitle": "Décret de prorogation du délai d'évaluation de la situation d'espèces sauvages, Vol. 137, n<sup>o</sup> 18",
                    "html": null,
                    "pdf": "g1-13718_o1_f.pdf"
                }
            ],
            "consultationEndDate": "2003-05-18T00:00:00",
            "consultationStartDate": "2003-05-03T00:00:00",
            "consultationStatusId": 2,
            "consultationYear": 2003,
            "documentCreateDate": "2003-05-05T10:26:57",
            "documentId": 43,
            "documentTitle": "Order Extending the Time for the Assessment of the Status of Wildlife Species",
            "documentType": "Orders",
            "recoveryDocumentStatusId": null
        }
    ]
}

ConsultationRecord.description: A record of a public consultation.

attachmentLanguage.description: Attachment language in English or French.

ConsultationsSearchPostResponse.description: Return the filtered public consultation results.

recordCount.description: The total number of records returned by the search.

records.description: A list of public consultation records.

ConsultationsSearchRequest.description: The request body to a POST request for Public Consultation filtering.

years.description: List of years of Public Consultations.

DocumentsSearchGetResponse.description: Returns the default document results with default filter settings.

recordCount.description: The total number of records returned by the search.
